sentences.sContent: In the course of these new developments the design of the entire simulator equipment and the Instructor Operating Station (IOS) have been improved and adapted to ergonomic requirements.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the course of these new developments the design of the entire simulator equipment and the Instructor Operating Station (IOS) have been improved and adapted to ergonomic requirements.
sentences.sCn: 在新的开发过程中，整个仿真设备和指令操作站（IOS）的设计经过了改善，满足人类环境改造学的要求。

phrases.pCn: 人因设计；工效学设计；人体工学设计

trans.tranCn: 人类环境改造学的；人类工程学的
